text: Asher Dov Angel (born September 6, 2002) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Jonah Beck in the 2017 Disney Channel series Andi Mack and as Billy Batson in the DC Extended Universe movie Shazam!. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Singers from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Asher Angel
